active_learning.discussion_prompt: Debate which ATT&CK tactic (e.g., Initial Access or Command and Control) is most challenging to defend against in a cloud environment and why, citing specific techniques/sub-techniques (e.g., T1078 Valid Accounts) and real-world examples.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in MITRE ATT&CK. Topic Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Threat Intelligence And Hunting > Threat Intelligence Platforms > 003_Frameworks and Methodologies > MITRE ATT&CK Framework > ATT&CK Techniques and Sub-Techniques. Research Context: MITRE ATT&CK is a knowledge base of adversary TTPs (Tactics: 'why' e.g., TA0001 Initial Access; Techniques: 'how' e.g., T1566 Phishing; Sub-techniques: granular e.g., T1566.001 Spearphishing Attachment; Procedures: specific uses). Differs from Cyber Kill Chain (linear: Reconnaissance→Weaponization→Delivery→Exploitation→Installation→C2→Actions). Sources: attack.mitre.org/matrices/enterprise/, cisa.gov Best Practices for MITRE ATT&CK Mapping, abusix.com/blog/cyber-kill-chain-vs-mitre-attck (mapping guide). Prerequisites: Cyber Kill Chain knowledge. Use provided Learning Objectives (span Bloom's: Remember definitions; Understand relationships; Apply mapping; Analyze vs. Kill Chain; Evaluate coverage; Create scenarios). Incorporate Active Learning (discussion on cloud challenges, peer teach T1078, log mapping). Follow Scaffolding Layers 1-4. Generate 25 flashcards using Flashcard Schema: Mix Basic Q&A (8), MCQ with distractor protocol (10), Application (7). Output as JSON array: [{'type': '...', 'front': '...', 'back': '...', 'bloom_level': '...', 'layer': 1-4, 'explanation': '...'}]. Ensure pedagogical depth: Tie to objectives/layers, use examples (TA0001/T1566/T1566.001), visuals if describable, no criminal assistance.
